handshape.description: The shape of the hand when signing, identified by its name in ASL. Should not be translated in any language other than Toki Pona

movement.description: The motion of the hand when signing.

placement.description: The placement of the hand when signing.

orientation.description: The orientation of the hand when signing.

additionalProperties.description: Partly localized descriptions of how a sign is signed.

parameters_data.description: A raw data object containing dictionary info about Toki Pona words
